Question: This person's original death mask was created around 6 May, though it is not clear which doctor created it.
Hints: This person asserted the army would follow him, and Ney replied the army would follow its generals.
However, this person was able to rush reinforcements to Antwerp, owing to Britain's inadequately organised Walcheren Campaign.
This person had a civil marriage with Joséphine de Beauharnais, without religious ceremony, on 9 March 1796.
